did.unittitle: Lester M. Salamon papers

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The Lester M. Salamon papers are arranged into the following series:

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Lester M. Salamon papers contain drafts, publications, presentations, books, project materials, correspondence, and photographs. Most of the material pertains to Salamon's articles and books. There are many drafts in the collection, with versions written and edited by Salamon. Additionally, there is course material from Johns Hopkins University, project files, and documentation of various conferences and trips. Despite Lester Salamon being a board member of the International Society for Third-Sector Research (ISTR), there are only a few files related to his time there.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research. Researchers interested in accessing digital media (floppy disks, CDs, DVDs, etc.) in this collection must use an access surrogate. The original items may not be accessed because of preservation concerns. Access copy currently unavailable. Please contact a RAC archivist for further instruction.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The hier(s) of Lester M. Salamon retain copyright and literary property rights in the records but grant the RAC the ability to give permission to researchers to quote and cite material in their publications, RAC will refer requests for any permission to reproduce material in its entirety to the representative of Lester M. Salamon's literary estate (Lynda Salamon or her designee).

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The Lester M. Salamon papers were donated to the RAC by his wife Lynda Salamon in 2022.

did.unittitle: Writings

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Writings series contains poems, journal articles, drafts of book chapters, and material related to the many publications written by Lester Salamon. Copies of published books can be found in the "Books" series.
